about_the_game:
WILD COUNTRY is a fantastical strategy game where players use beautifully illustrated cards to construct buildings and perform abilities to build the best city. Buildings score points, and the first to reach the objective wins!

Wild Country combines CCG gameplay with innovative mechanics inspired by classic city-building games to create something unique and approachable. This game is for people looking for something wholesome, comedic, strategic, and full of things to do.

Do you have what it takes to win?

Feature Overview

  • Build your deck of 30 cards. Each card represents a Building, Ability, or Event with a unique action. The goal of the game is to outsmart and outearn your rival.

  • Play cards to place buildings and earn enough profit, but remember that placing certain building types next to one another can have positive (or negative) effects.

  • There is always something new to collect, learn, and master. There’s a deck for every personality and playstyle, and it’s up to you to discover your winning strategy.

  • Grow your collection and stand out from the crowd! There’s a ton to customize, from mayors, skins, and outfits to flags, emotes, and cards.

  • Embark on a journey like no other! Advance through a campaign bursting with mysteries to discover, quests to uncover, and things to do.

  • Grab your friends to join the chaos with competitive and casual game modes!

  • Don’t be afraid if you’re new to the genre! Anyone can join the fun with intuitive mechanics and customizable gameplay options to suit your needs.

Compete against rival competitors in a battle to build the best city. Watch out for earthquakes, snowstorms, and rebellious raccoons. Unpredictable events test your resolve or turn the tide of battle.

Whether new to card games or a seasoned fan, Wild Country offers endless replayability, strategic gameplay, and unpredictable mischief.

There is always something new to collect, learn, and master. There’s a deck for every personality and playstyle, and it’s up to you to find the cards for your winning strategy.

Select and customize from a wild cast of characters, each with their own personalities.

Embark on a journey like no other and complete Wild Country’s expansive story campaign.

Explore Big Sky Canyon, an idyllic region scattered with a colorful cast of characters. Some think you’re cool, some are determined to beat you, and others might be from the future.

Collect cards, discover mysteries, and battle other competitors in the single-player campaign... Or just enjoy the view.

Take your cards online and compete in both casual and ranked matches!

Make friends, make rivals, make profit, and have fun!

NO EXPERIENCE NECESSARY

Never played a CCG or City Builder before? No problem! Wild Country is easy to pick up and play, with plenty of depth for those with the skills.

Anyone can join the fun with patient mechanics and customizable gameplay to suit your needs. Need extra time? Opponent too difficult? Don’t worry, you can change all that.

REGULAR UPDATES & EVENTS

Regular updates, events, and limited-time content keep WILD COUNTRY fresh and exciting.

Free updates containing fixes and improvements, as well as new quests, challenges, and collectible content, help to improve your experience, grow your collection, and keep your claws sharp.

The next update is never too far away.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra - 10.13.1
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 780m
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

name: Wild Country

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

reviews:
“Wild Country is part city builder, part card battler, and all chaos.”
GamesRadar

“If you’re looking for an experience that both tests and soothes your brain, Wild Country just might be your next favorite game.”
PCGamesN

“Dorfromantik showed how it can be satisfying to see a city grow and synergize piece by piece. By making it competitive, Wild Country sometimes got even more engrossing. Fans of card games, city-builders, and strategy games should keep an eye on Wild Country.”
DigitalTrends
short_description: Wild Country is a cozy-competitive card game with city-building elements! Collect cards, construct buildings, explore Big Sky, and challenge friends in this one of a kind strategy game.
